about_the_game:
Originally enclosed in the limited edition of Mushihimesama HD, the Mushihimesama Special Arrange Album features Manabu Namiki's original compositions arranged by the remaining composers of Basiscape, sans Sakimoto, giving the Arrange mode its own identity.

Includes 14 audio tracks in mp3 and lossless formats.

Composed by:
Manabu Namiki (Basiscape)
Masaharu Iwata (Basiscape) (03, 04, 05, 06, 13)

Arranged by:
Masaharu Iwata (Basiscape) (5, 6, 13)
Azusa Chiba (Basiscape) (4, 7, 11, 12)
Yoshimi Kudo (Basiscape) (8, 9, 14)
Mitsuhiro Kaneda (Basiscape) (2, 10)
Kimihiro Abe (Basiscape) (1, 3)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 119 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 370 MB available space

short_description: Soundtrack from the Arrange mode, originally enclosed in the limited edition of Mushihimesama HD.
